attributes.action: Stop using public funds for IVF and pregnancy payments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop using huge sums of public money to fund IVF and pregnancy. We cannot care for people already within the systems never mind funding for those who do not yet exist. Fact of nature not everyone is destined to produce a child accept this adopt unwanted children. It is not the responsibility of the tax payer to fund pregnancy it should be self financed,

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
